title: Trying to decide on what to aim for in a "new" car
body:
Since my car is donezo I have to find a new one eventually so I'm weighing my options at the 0-3000 dollar range.

Options I've got so far:
1994ish Celica
Late 90s BMW 740
mid 2000s Hyundai, any kind

What other stuff do you think I should look out for when I have the cash?
